stages.title: Python Fundamentals & Core Math
stages.description: Solidify Python foundations and essential mathematical concepts for ML.
stages.project_idea: Create a simple command-line tool to perform statistical analysis on a dataset (e.g., calculate mean, median, standard deviation, correlation).

stages.title: Machine Learning Foundations
stages.description: Dive into core ML algorithms and implement them using Scikit-learn.
stages.project_idea: Build a classification model to predict customer churn or a regression model to predict house prices using a publicly available dataset from Kaggle.

stages.title: Deep Learning with PyTorch
stages.description: Learn the fundamentals of deep learning and implement neural networks using PyTorch.
resources: Intro to Deep Learning with PyTorch - Udacity
stages.project_idea: Train a convolutional neural network (CNN) to classify images from the CIFAR-10 dataset or build a recurrent neural network (RNN) for text generation.

stages.title: Specialization & Application
stages.description: Focus on a specific AI domain (NLP, Computer Vision, Reinforcement Learning) and apply your skills to a more complex project.
stages.project_idea: Build a sentiment analysis model using pre-trained transformers from Hugging Face, or implement a basic reinforcement learning agent to solve a simple game environment (e.g., OpenAI Gym's CartPole).
